name: TrollFools(Huami1314)
subtitle: Tweak Injection Tool for TrollStore (iOS 15+)
localizedDescription: TrollFools is a powerful utility for TrollStore users on iOS 15 and above, allowing tweak injection into various apps. It offers features like version locking, advanced injection options, and more.
